It likes me! It really, really LIKES me!

By Gruntcow on Sunday, June 8, 2008 - 11:43 am:

It's not really a question, but more of something I noticed that I hadn't heard about in the forums yet...

I looked at the likes/dislikes screen for one of my monsters, and its like changed to ME! Unless there's some secret item out there called "Scott", that is.

I had earned a lenient training style, even though I'd scold it every once in a while... and I guess I was REALLY lenient!
